ack.p: The authors would like to thank Franco Marsico and Juan Manuel Carballeda for their help with sequence alignments and RNA structure predictions. We thank Michael Diamond for providing us monoclonal antibody CHK-152. We are grateful to Marco Vignuzzi for Chikungunya virus cDNA clones. We are grateful to Cecilia Frecha for providing us the human fibroblasts. We thank the volunteers for participation in this study and the ICAReB staff for its support. Andrea Gamarnik and members of our laboratory are also acknowledged for helpful discussions and critical reading of the manuscript.
